item.title: TIL - Git submodules
item.description: List existing submodules Link to heading git submodule status Add a submodule Link to heading git submodule add --depth 1 git@github.com:filippo82/sample-apps.git

item.title: TIL - Create custom avatars for Brave browser
item.description: Create the Avatars directory inside /Users/filippo/Library/Application Support/BraveSoftware/Brave-Browser. Add a new PNG image inside the Avatars directory. The recommended size is 190 x 190. The new image must be named as one of the images found here. This will override the specific avatar in the profile configuration. The image of the avatar will not change but, after selecting it, you will see the custom image in the top right corner.
